body.p: To His Excellency James F Robinson Governor of of Kentucky Your Petitioners would state that Mrs Jno Kavanaugh is the wife of one Jno Kavanaugh who was indicted at the last Term of the Jefferson Circuit Court with one William White for the malicious stabbing of one Strom Ryan In consideration of her condition and of her helpless children we pray you to pardon said John Kavanaugh at the facts of the case are given in the petition of Mr White which is now on file in your office they were indicted together and it is shown that William White did the cutting and not Jno Kavanaugh

Respectfully
Bridgford & Co
A B. W Allen
Edward Morris & Co
J T Morris & Sons
A. Duvall Jr.
George N. Bohn

Felony
